categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Alyla Cylone was a female Nothoiin and an operative of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. She and two other Alliance operatives arrived in the Anoat sector shortly before the Iron Blockade went up in response to the Galactic Empire's defeat at Endor. Despite her claim to have never been to the sector before, her local knowledge proved otherwise.
Months into the blockade, Cylone joined the crew of a young smuggler, assisting them on various missions.
